item.title: How to Become Better (Developer)
item.description: Fundamentals are forever. So it would be wise to invest your time to grow those.

item.title: Writing Year in Review Article
item.description: My attempt at writing the Year in Review Article for 2020.

item.title: Interesting reads - volume #13
item.description: Woohoo, we're already at lucky number 13! Did you know that number 13 is considered lucky to the Chinese? Featuring @adamwathan, @marcelpociot, @calebporzio and many others.

item.title: Interesting reads - volume #12
item.description: We again have a selection of PHP (mostly Laravel but there are Symfony and WordPress reads as well) and JavaScript (React). Though there is a lot of assorted tech reads as well (and some CSS ones).
